title: Landscape
credit_line: Gift of William C. Arthur in memory of his grandfather, Edmund Watts, to whom it was presented by the artist c. 1855
provenance_text:
David Gilmour Blythe [1815-1865], until 1855?; Edmund Watts, Pittsburgh, PA, 1855? [1]; Edmund W. Arthur, his grandson, 1911?; William C. Arthur, his brother, Meadville, PA, 1950? until 1962; gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1962. 
NOTES: [1] According to correspondence from William C. Arthur, Edmund Watts accepted this painting from Blythe as payment for tailoring services. See curatorial file.

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
